en-US.min_comment: Minimum time that can be chosen by the user
en-US.max_comment: Maximum time that can be chosen by the user
en-US.localized_comment: Show the date localized in the output
en-US.relative_comment: Show the time relatively (eg 50 minutes ago)
en-US.icon_left_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the left of the input
en-US.icon_right_comment: Choose an optional icon to display on the right of the input
en-US.utc_comment: Save to and display from UTC
en-US.default_to_current_datetime_comment: Sets the default value to current datetime
en-US.format_comment: The DateTime format to use for the input
